response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $15,000 to us, reflecting its quality, uniqueness, and potential benefits. We believe it could be a valuable asset for you, tailored to meet your specific needs or aspirations. Considering its worth and the opportunity it presents, we are offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. We hope this aligns with your valuation and budget, allowing us to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 14000}
